name: Landline Remover
author: Portman Holdings LLC

sections.description:
This plugin integrates a Landline Remover API into wordpress envoirnment so users can easily access the Landline Remover API functions.
for example the user can search his/her phone number and check its Line type, DNC status, Know Litigator and remaining credits.

You can read more about this API pn thier official website https://landlineremover.com/ .

For terms of services visit https://landlineremover.com/terms-of-services/ | For privacy policy visit https://landlineremover.com/privary-policy/

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. Check phone number
  2. Check remaining Credits

Unordered list:

  • Check phone number
  • Check remaining Credits
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload wp-landline-remover-api.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings page under Number Checker page and add you Landline Remover API key there
sections.faq:
Does it work with latest WordPress versions

Yes

upgrade_notice.1.0.2: Upgrade to get better user experience and all the functionality provided by Landline Remover API

screenshots.caption: Plugin settings page where you enter your Landline Remover API key and can see your remaining balance in Landline Remover API
Phone number checking screen where you can enter a number and check its details
Here you can see the line type and DNC type as well as known litigator status
Here in the settings screen after saving API key you can see your account credits
